forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
